content: It's the kind of place that makes you think about... the mysticism of scents! {A灵光一现}Perfume might not attract butterflies, but mosquitoes instead.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在自然馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: {A思考星光}Actually, I almost went down the path of researching butterflies. When I'm reading, I'm often greeted by a butterfly landing on me to rest.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在自然馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: However, rather than a mysterious phenomenon, it sounds more like... one of Mors's bad jokes?
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在自然馆-1005幻雪_邀约

content: I couldn't help but carefully study their gentle fluttering... {A打喷嚏}Only to discover I'm allergic to the scales on their wings!
